name: Stick To Procedure
description:
A cool Sega Genesis style game with a CRT filter for immersion. This game does have controller support!

High score saves are only on the download, not in the browser.
Never mind I guess it does save?????????????????????????????? let me know if it does pls

controls:

left - A key, left arrow key, or left on the joystick if you have a controller.

right - D key, right arrow key, or right on the controller joystick.

Jump - W key, Spacebar, Up arrow key, or the A button on your controller

Rockets - R key or the right trigger
